***** VALID MAPS GUIDE *****

-	The map must be closed/ surrounded by walls
-	The map must have at least one exit (E), one collectible (C),
	and one starting position (P).
-	The map must be rectangular

***** VALID MAPS EXAMPLES *****

111111111111
1001000000C1
100001111001
1P0011E00001
111111111111

1111111111111111111111111111111111
1E0000000000000C00000C000000000001
1010010100100000101001000000010101
1010010010101010001001000000010101
1P0000000C00C0000000000000000000C1
1111111111111111111111111111111111

***** INVALID MAPS EXAMPLES *****

** Map not closed **
111111111111
1000C000E001
000000000001
100000C0C011
111111111111

** No player map **
111111111111
100000C001C1
10000ECCC111
100000000001
111111111111

** No collectible map **
111111111111
100000000101
10000E000111
100000000001
111111111111

** No exit map **
111111111111
100000C001C1
100000CCC111
100000000001
111111111111

** Map not rectangular **
1 11111111111
1100C000E0001
100000000001
11111111111111
    1

** Map that contains wrong characters **
111111111111
100000C0C011
1E00001000J1
100Z01111001
111111111111
